column4: anyone know why my wlan0 connects to a router but then drops it 5-10 seconds later? (happens on multiple routers)
nope, it was working for a while
but then all of a sudden it stopped working. It also won't switch from roaming mode
then i fear the card could be broken
but some routers work and some don't?
I don't think so... I don't really know enough
maybe I will format and reinstall
